job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Designation/Position Name

Software Engineer

Number of Vacancies

1

Client Name

Johnson & Johnson Services, Inc

Mode of Hire (TP/FTE/Either)

TP

Customer Interview Required (Yes/No)

Yes

Job Title

Associate/Contractor

Job Description

(Define At least 6 points which candidate is supposed to do)

Experience: 3 to 5yrs

Familiar with J&J Vision products

Need to work with systems group, perform calibration, run work flows, measure if any signals

Go through systems error logs and should be able to understand issues

Embedded systems understanding including SW, HW and FW

Should be quick learner and flexible in working

Key Skills And Competencies Required

Actively participate among cross-functional teams to ensure projects are delivered on time and to required quality standards.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

Ability to organize, plan and execute multiple tasks to tight schedules

Highly motivated self-starter

Ability to document own work clearly and precisely

Excellent communication skills

Education And Experience

Bachelor Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent degree

Positions based at (Client location with Zip code)

Johnson and Johnson Vision

510 Cottonwood Dr, Milpitas, CA 95035

Work Authorization (Citizen/GC/H1B/Either)

Either

Mandatory Skills

Technical / Soft Skills

Expertise Level (Expert / Good / Knowledge)

Remarks

C++

Good

Embedded Knowledge

Good

Communication skills

Good

SDLC

Good

Thanks & Have a great Day.

Akash Kumar

Technical Recruiter

SoftHQ Inc

Consulting Development Staffing
